### Maintenance Type
What type of maintenance is this? (e.g. code cleanup, refactor, dependency update, documentation update)

### Scope of Work
Describe the specific files, modules, or areas of the project that need maintenance.

### Expected Outcomes
What improvements or changes do you expect from this maintenance task?

### Additional context
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
